title: PSS Response
description: A response containing the results from the PSS.

recordedDate.description: Date on which the information was recorded

indication.description: Condition that triggered the PSS response

treatmentOptions.description: List of search results provided by PSS

id.description: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

modifierExtension.description:

Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. scoreRating.description: Code (e.g. color code) associated with the score (Red, Orange, Green)

radiationExposure.description: Radiation exposure associated with the response

evidenceSource.description: Link to a source (study, publication, etc.) for the PSS
